title: Apple has seeded iOS 15.4 developer beta 5, here’s what’s new
content:
Apple has seeded iOS 15.4 developer beta 5, following the release of beta 4 last week. Unlike iOS 15.3, iOS 15.4 comes packed with new features, changes, and additions. These include support for Face ID when masked for iPhone 12 and newer models, new emoji, updates to Keychain, and much more. To download this update,

The post Apple has seeded iOS 15.4 developer beta 5, here’s what’s new appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple has seeded iOS 15.4 beta 5 to developers. This version of iOS comes packed with changes, including new emoji.
